Attributes and Properties #

Property Attribute Type Default Description
active active boolean false
autofocus autofocus boolean false When this control is rendered, focus it automatically
disabled disabled boolean false Disable this control. It will not receive focus or events
focused focused boolean false
noWrap no-wrap boolean false
selected selected boolean false
tabIndex tabIndex number The tab index to apply to this control. See general documentation about the tabindex HTML property
value value string

Slots #

Name Description
default slot text content to display within the Menu Item
icon icon element to be placed at the start of the Menu Item
value content placed at the end of the Menu Item like values, keyboard shortcuts, etc.

Events #

Name Description
keydown Trick :focus-visible polyfill into thinking keyboard based focus
sp-menu-item-added announces the item has been added so a parent menu can take ownerships
sp-menu-item-removed announces when removed from the DOM so the parent menu can remove ownership and update selected state
